turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to to order some pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, how many pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All of them normal crust. I don't need anything special.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and what about the toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need one of them with mushrooms and olive.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Two of them just regular cheese, and one of them with just bacon. And if I can get it, I want all of them to have extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the extra cheese will be $2.50 per pizza, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have: 4 small pizzas with extra cheese. one with mushrooms and olives, two cheese pizzas and the third just bacon and cheese. is this correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. your total will be $38.50 plus tax.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup at bela luna's soon!
